languages.text: {n}Вы поразительно — даже подозрительно — легко перехватываете у Маражая клинок и прижимаете раскаленный кончик к его шее. Друкари дергается и издает болезненный вой, но ваша хватка крепка — вы не даете ксеносу и шевельнуться, пока каленый металл не выводит на его бледной коже символ династии фон Валанциус. Наконец, Маражай отшатывается от вас и кончиками пальцев касается клейма на своей шее. {/n}

{n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы поразительно — даже подозрительно — легко перехватываете у Маражая клинок и прижимаете раскаленный кончик к его шее. Друкари дергается и издает болезненный вой, но ваша хватка крепка — вы не даете ксеносу и шевельнуться, пока каленый металл не выводит на его бледной коже символ династии фон Валанциус. Наконец, Маражай отшатывается от вас и кончиками пальцев касается клейма на своей шее. {/n}

languages.text: {n}出乎你的意料，你轻而易举地夺下了玛拉斋手中的利刃，简单得甚至有些可疑。你将刀尖抵在他的脖子上，他挣扎着，发出了痛苦的嚎叫，但你死死地抓住了他，直到烧红的利刃将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的印记烙在了他苍白的皮肤上，你才松开了手。他猛地挣脱了你的束缚，抬起手，触碰着脖子上的烙印。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}出乎你的意料，你轻而易举地夺下了玛拉斋手中的利刃，简单得甚至有些可疑。你将刀尖抵在他的脖子上，他挣扎着，发出了痛苦的嚎叫，但你死死地抓住了他，直到烧红的利刃将冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的印记烙在了他苍白的皮肤上，你才松开了手。他猛地挣脱了你的束缚，抬起手，触碰着脖子上的烙印。{/n}

languages.text: {n}驚くほど…いや、疑わしいほど楽々とマラズハイの刃を掴み、その鋭い刃先を彼の首に押し付ける。マラズハイはのたうち回って、苦悶の叫び声を上げるが、手元はしっかり握りしめた。真っ赤に焼けた金属がその青白い肌にフォン・ヴァランシウスのシンボルを刻み込むまで、動く事を許さなかった。ついにマラズハイは拘束から逃れると、首の刻印に触れようと指を立這わせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驚くほど…いや、疑わしいほど楽々とマラズハイの刃を掴み、その鋭い刃先を彼の首に押し付ける。マラズハイはのたうち回って、苦悶の叫び声を上げるが、手元はしっかり握りしめた。真っ赤に焼けた金属がその青白い肌にフォン・ヴァランシウスのシンボルを刻み込むまで、動く事を許さなかった。ついにマラズハイは拘束から逃れると、首の刻印に触れようと指を立這わせた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arrebatas el puñal a Marazhai con una facilidad sorprendente, incluso sospechosa, y presionas la punta candente contra su cuello. El drukhari se debate y profiere un aullido agónico, pero tu presa es firme: no le permites moverse hasta que el metal al rojo termina de grabar el emblema de la casa von Valancius en su pálida piel. Finalmente logra zafarse de ti, llevándose los dedos al cuello para palparse la marca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arrebatas el puñal a Marazhai con una facilidad sorprendente, incluso sospechosa, y presionas la punta candente contra su cuello. El drukhari se debate y profiere un aullido agónico, pero tu presa es firme: no le permites moverse hasta que el metal al rojo termina de grabar el emblema de la casa von Valancius en su pálida piel. Finalmente logra zafarse de ti, llevándose los dedos al cuello para palparse la marca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous saisissez de l'arme de Marazhai avec une aisance aussi inattendue que suspecte et en pressez la pointe chauffée à blanc contre son cou. Il se débat et pousse un hurlement de douleur, sans pour autant parvenir à se dégager de votre étreinte. Vous le maintenez fermement en place le temps que le métal rougi marque sa chair blafarde du symbole des von Valancius. Au bout de quelques instants, il finit par se libérer avant d'effleurer du bout des doigts la brûlure sur sa peau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous saisissez de l'arme de Marazhai avec une aisance aussi inattendue que suspecte et en pressez la pointe chauffée à blanc contre son cou. Il se débat et pousse un hurlement de douleur, sans pour autant parvenir à se dégager de votre étreinte. Vous le maintenez fermement en place le temps que le métal rougi marque sa chair blafarde du symbole des von Valancius. Au bout de quelques instants, il finit par se libérer avant d'effleurer du bout des doigts la brûlure sur sa peau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du greifst nach Marazhais Klinge und bist überrascht, wie verdächtig leicht das klappt. Dann drückst du die glühende Spitze gegen seinen Hals. Er zappelt und heult gequält auf, aber dein Griff bleibt fest – du lässt nicht zu, dass er sich bewegen kann, bis das glühende Metall das Von-Valancius-Symbol in seine fahle Haut gebrannt hat. Schließlich weicht er ruckartig zurück und berührt das Brandmal an seinem Hals.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du greifst nach Marazhais Klinge und bist überrascht, wie verdächtig leicht das klappt. Dann drückst du die glühende Spitze gegen seinen Hals. Er zappelt und heult gequält auf, aber dein Griff bleibt fest – du lässt nicht zu, dass er sich bewegen kann, bis das glühende Metall das Von-Valancius-Symbol in seine fahle Haut gebrannt hat. Schließlich weicht er ruckartig zurück und berührt das Brandmal an seinem Hals.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın bıçağını şaşırtıcı, hatta kuşkulu bir rahatlıkla ele geçirip kızgın ucunu boynuna dayıyorsun. Debelenip acı içinde feryat koparsa da bıçağı elinden bırakmıyorsun. Akkor hâldeki metalle solgun derisine von Valancius sembolünü dağlamadan hareket etmesine izin vermiyorsun. En sonunda kendini senden kurtarıyor. Damgaya dokunmak için parmaklarını boynuna uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's blade with surprising, even suspicious, ease and press the blistering tip against his neck. He thrashes and lets out an agonised howl, but your grip is firm — you do not allow him to move until the red-hot metal has seared the von Valancius symbol into his pale skin. Finally, he jerks away from you, bringing his fingers up to touch the brand on his neck.{/n}
